Review.Contenu: Website builder was a great tool to use until i had to structure the products in such a way that was fixed to the template design of go daddy, I ended up switching to shopify because there was most structure to offer there. Go daddy is missing key features that make a advance store pop. Customer log in's, Vehicle year and model selections etc.

Review.Titre: I feel GoDaddy is offering substandard…
Review.Contenu: I feel GoDaddy is offering substandard services in the name of COVID.  The pandemic is a gone story and everyone in the world is living normal life.  GoDaddy still claims the wait times are higher because of COVID protocols.  Making us wait for a minimum of 10 minutes to get to an agent and this time, the agent claimed she was not able to hear me.  Ended up spending 10 minutes without being able to get hold of an agent.  I am really worried to try again now because, I may end up wasting another 10 plus minutes.

Review.Titre: My phone was still on airplane mode…
Review.Contenu: My phone was still on airplane mode from a trip.  It never rang.  I tried to call in from my husband's phone and was not able to talk to the person who had tried to contact me.  It took 20 minutes to find our I had to set up a new appointment and then several more minutes to make the person understand that I wanted to set up the appointment.

Review.Titre: Since Godaddy has taken over Wild west…
Review.Contenu: Since Godaddy has taken over Wild west domains the customer service and products have gone down hill. I can never get anything done in customer service without spending an hour or more on the phone and even them most of the time the issues are not resolved. Promised call backs are never received. Products that were previously offered free are now being charged a yearly fee. Today I received service that I was used to receiving and hopefully this is a start of returning to great service.

Review.Titre: Their website is sooooo hard to…
Review.Contenu: Their website is sooooo hard to understand and as a result instead of cancelling the renewal I cancelled the whole account even though I had paid for entire year for email hosting.  A few calls and failed chat attempts and ALL of my stored emails on their server is lost to me apparently.  Emails I needed.  Customer support was not helpful.  If I were you and trying to run a legitimate business I would suggest either hiring a professional to deal with all this crap or head over to g$%$gle.

Review.Titre: Kept selling me more and more garbage
Review.Contenu: Kept selling me more and more garbage, to the point they sold me a managed wordpress subscription after I told them I needed to upload files. I instead needed a cPanel. After being sold this I purchased the doamin, both internal and external, likely not needed the internal. After all of this, come to find out the cPanel is being charged at $21 per month. A quick look at other hosting sites and average price is $2.95 per month. I will now be transfering all of my not needed products off of GoDaddy, never to return.

Review.Titre: needing to re-enter password in outlook …
Review.Contenu: it has to do with constant requirement of the passwords needing to be re-entered. Authenticating with microsoft directly instead of MS via Go daddy's portal. only happens on email hosted at go daddy.

Review.Titre: renewal prices never ceased to rise
Review.Contenu: renewal prices never ceased to rise.  products and services which were included with the purchased domains kept being turned into fee-charging options.

Review.Titre: Useless customer service
Review.Contenu: Useless customer service. Expensive email plans.I wouldn't recommend it.Despite asking for advice several times for which plan I should chose and how to set it up, and then trying to pay for it - after several days of waiting to hear from the operator - I was told when I called up that 'he's working on it' but it never got resolved. He never responded.To be ghosted before even becoming a customer is ridiculous. That's just bad business.I've since switched to another email provider.

Review.Titre: GoDaddy bought our old hosting service…
Review.Contenu: GoDaddy bought our old hosting service Media temple like a year back. We had some issues with the transfers, emails not working on what have you. That I'm ok with but the customer service is probably the worst I ever have been in contact with. Long chats and they promise to find a solution via email that they never send. First off the ai-bot just takes my time and doesnt give any value. Give you support cases a number so someone can go back and check what the customer have already said so I dont need to go trought it like 3-4 times before any potential help. I hope you solve this soon for you own sake.

Review.Titre: Easy but not transparent costing
Review.Contenu: i LIKE IT IS easy to get new domains and to buy new services. But I feel that there is little transparency in price and funciton of services. and just experienced that i bought a domain for a simple hobby  - domainemudderklire.eu. Paid for the domain for fiv eyears and expected like with earlier domains to ahve at least one page free of charge instead I entered five days free testing of your cprofessional website programmes and suddenly was caught and automatically paid the full price. it is not nice and fair and professional

Review.Titre: Try avoiding godaddy
Review.Contenu: Was unable to cancel the server service as the website would crash upon the cancellation page (weird). I tried that on a few different occasions and the same thing happened. I then got charged as an auto-renewal. Tried asking for refund and got declined as "it is out of policy"Update: I spoke to GoDaddy support again and they were unable to refund me, even though I had proof that I was unable to cancel the membership myself. They cancelled the membership for me. However, I did not get a refund as it is "Out of Policy". Luckily I claimed my money back through Paypal,

Review.Titre: Speak more slowly and carefully please.
Review.Contenu: II would like to see a contact phone number not just a chat on the site. I got the number from the chat which was helpful. The person I spoke to was friendly, knowledgeable and successfully completed my request. However, I had to ask him to repeat his comments more slowly each time he spoke as he spoke so fast that I could not understand him probably because of his thick accent. Customer service people should have very clear english not just passable when answering inquiries by phone. Love the products and appreciated the help but it took me 3 hours on the computer and phone to get my needs met.

Review.Titre: Their services are the bare minimum
Review.Contenu: Their services are the bare minimum. Their customer service is awful.I have been waiting for 25 minutes in line just to be unceremoniously hunged up. When finally they answered, I have been in line for another 26 minutes.I have been calling because I wanted to download all the data associated with the emails, and, after almost two weeks from my request I could download the folder, which turned out to be.. empty. Their solution was to send me an email with instructions to download my data through Microsoft Outlook. This is an embarrassing experience and I don't want to have anything to do with them

Review.Titre: Super Confusing Products/Pricing/Billing
Review.Contenu: On their website, their list of my domains and pricing is ridiculously confusing and misleading -- seemingly shady. The customer service rep couldn't help me understand it either, as he/she couldn't seem to understand. I have autorenew set up and so far I can't find out what is the TOTAL price for my "products".

Review.Titre: Long time customer growing fed up and ready to explore other providers
Review.Contenu: I have always found for the most part that my service experience over the many years I've been a customer has been exemplary. But costs are getting to be so high for renewals that I've been dropping many domains especially .tv's  And now yesterday a .com that I've had for years cost 30 plus tax for a 1yr renewal. It would be nice to get some discounts on renewals. Maybe it's time for me to look around for other hosting solutions. Even having to pay extra for https certificate is unsavory. Thank you.

Review.Titre: GoDaddy renewal prices have become absolutely OUTRAGEOUS!
Review.Contenu: The email accounts I have with GoDaddy were all originally FREE with the registrations of the domains with which they are associated.Then GoDaddy decided to stop honoring these free email accounts and instead force existing customers into Office 365 email accounts with increasingly steep fees.Worse yet, GoDaddy, which only RARELY offers any savings promo codes for domain renewals, NEVER offers any savings promo code for renewals of email accounts.I realize I could simply transfer the service of my products to a different domain service provider, but I would prefer to keep my business with the same company...if only GoDaddy would please reward my loyalty with RENEWAL SAVINGS PROMO CODES. Thank you.

Review.Titre: Pathetic Product & Services
Review.Contenu: Pathetic Product & Services. A company which don't have a ticket-raising process if you are facing a problem. you have to waste time and call on their paid customer care number. Once you buy the product, you would have to run around them to get your services enabled. Zero Customer Service Process.

Review.Titre: Very pushy sales strategy by their tech…
Review.Contenu: Very pushy sales strategy by their tech support and customer service team. Make out that they are giving great discount but actually just offering the same as what's on offer on their website. The team don't have any care about what the customer wants, just want to make a sale and don't explain things in any detail just wanting to get the customer over the line. Very disappointed with GoDaddy, had been designing my website before I purchase the plan and they really let me down. Now I feel I'm being locked in because they paid 0.89 for my domain name which I don't understand why they did it.Wished they had been honest and supportive and it wouldn't delay me buying a plan with them.

Review.Titre: Expensive plan pricing with no free trial
Review.Contenu: I wanted to try GoDaddy's Managed WooCommerce Store but they require a $35.00/month or $240.00/year payment to be able to test the essential plan. They don't offer free trial.

Review.Titre: The ONLY thing that might save…
Review.Contenu: The ONLY thing that might save Godaddy's business on the face of customers is their support. Because I've heard it... I've been told not to buy domains through Godaddy, or hosting plans... not to buy their products because they are scammers. But what made me do it, was their support team. Something that in the end might mean a value for someone who is not technical in this matters... Chat assistants...And in the end they fool you every single time just to get a good survey punctuation and they are done. While the company, will be slowly going down... Cause UX is clearly a disaster. Confusing. Ambiguous. The only thing they have to rescue their business is their assistants and they are making it even worse. They are fooling clients.

Review.Titre: The issue was never resolved of simply…
Review.Contenu: The issue was never resolved of simply making a payment to reactivate my Go Daddy account.  Rather then completing that request, they sold me a new account that I did not want.  I told them I cannot afford to loose the information on my existing account and they did not apply those funds to that account.  I guess they get more money for new accounts opened.

Review.Titre: Unhelpful support
Review.Contenu: Unless you are using the Outlook email client, Godaddy will refuse to believe that there is a problem on their servers. They even say that other clients are 'non standard'.

Review.Titre: Customer rep seem to be in a rush
Review.Contenu: Customer rep seem to be in a rush,  she was trying to navigate me through a process and said never mind I’ll do it because she had been on the phone too long. Sometimes customers may need a little hand holding because they are not literate in this field. So if she could have handled that particular process in the first place then she should have at the first sign of difficulty instead of sounding frustrated and make the client feel like they're bothering her. Then she ran through instructions at lighting speed as if I was going to remember or even be able to write them down. I had to tell her to repeat or go back several times. Again I guess the call was too long.

Review.Titre: Hard to renew
Review.Contenu: Hard to renew. Trying to renew results in an error showing ErrorWe are unable to accept payment while your popup blocker is turned on. Once you disable it, you can complete your transaction.But I don’t have a pop up blocker and no other websites have this issue

Review.Titre: Service has gone downhill
Review.Contenu: Last 2 times I've contacted the help desk the team seem unwilling to offer assistance, I found myself repeating what I'd already said over and over again, which was frustrating, only to be told at the end they can't help? Not much point in continuing my plan with them then.This is upsetting because before this when I had issues the team where always good and sorted the problem. But it seems now the team just don't have any enthusiasm to help, this is especially annoying after the long call wait of 20+ minutes

Review.Titre: The UI is all over the place  prices high
Review.Contenu: The UI is all over thw place, in many places is redundant and yet incomplete. I  hate spanish and yet i M force to it and there is no way to have it in english. But tge worse sre the policies that are so blatlantly trying to keep customers thete.  Finallt the prices are thw highest in industry, so screw godaddy at thw first opportunity.

Review.Titre: GoDaddy sucks
Review.Contenu: I think that GoDaddy is  largely a price gouging,unresponsive ,POS company . They spend too much time trying to figure out ways to pry more money out of their present customers rather than building their customer base up. They mainly do this by adding mediocre services to their product offerings and raising prices . Their customer service reps are typically arrogant and rude. The only pleasant experience that I have ever had with with any of their people was with a girl named Freya last nite. She was friendly ,polite professional and helped me resolve my issue at least for the short term . Godaddy needs to promote her and have her train their CSR staff. Unfortunately, I don't think even she can change the culture at GoDaddy by herself. It's a nice thought though. Soon I will be changing my hosting and domain to a shared hosting and I will be done with GoDaddy forever! Thank God!Joseph MurphyGrimeBusters Cleaning ServicesKnoxville Tennessee

Review.Titre: Domain Never Showed in Auctions
Review.Contenu: Edit: They did refund me for this and I neglected to update the review earlier. My criticisms hold, but an effort was made toward remediation which was ok.For some reason, my domain "ajar.org" never even showed up in search results until I messaged them with an hour left, then it showed up, but only if you typed in the name. Customer service was extremely rude and condescending every time I wrote in. I really needed this and they let me down all week. Never, ever, ever would I use GoDaddy for anything again.

Review.Titre: GoDaddy you must do better.
Review.Contenu: GoDaddy are great if you don't need to talk to them or complain about something. However, if you do, then there appears to be no complaints contact email or telephone number making it very, very frustrating to deal with them. We have been trying to obtain a partial refund from GoDaddy for months (they suggested this, not us) and every time you contact them (Live Chat is the quickest) you have to go over everything again, even if you have a case number. I doubt very much this review will make any difference whatsoever, but this kind of experience seems very typical of large companies these days. Tread carefully when dealing with Go Daddy.

Review.Titre: Poor products and customer service. Leaving after 10+ years
Review.Contenu: Poor products and customer service. Got put on hold for an hour just to be transferred and immediately hung up on. When I finally do get through to customer service, it's not a good experience. I don't blame the actual workers. It's the management and leadership. I don't think they're interested in paying for quality for their customers, just the bare minimum. I've been a customer for over a decade and watched the quality of their products and customer service degrade. I would give 1 star, but at least they do have customer service.

Review.Titre: Added an ugly bar at the top
Review.Contenu: Added an ugly bar at the top that advertise to themselves, without saying anything to anyone. Just straight up bad and does not help their business. Whose ever idea that was should be fired.

Review.Titre: poor customer experience so far.
Review.Contenu: I have literally spent an hour trying to buy a domain from GoDaddy and the price went up from 20 pounds to £30 to 40 pounds to £50 to 60 pounds to nearly 70 pounds by the time I could pay.  I cannot work out how to print out a receipt so don't know if I've bought anything at all even though the money has come out of my account.  Very poor user experience so far.

Review.Titre: Casey was amazing
Review.Contenu: Casey was amazing.  I was prepared to drop GoDaddy and find another host until I spoke with Casey.  His knowledge, expertise and concern caused me to have a change of heart.  Casey made me feel extremely confident in his abilities and knowledge.

Review.Titre: Goddady agent who took an order at 3/7/23 on 6.33am should be fired.  He took renewal money and deleted everything
Review.Contenu: I paid for renewal, they took my money for renewal and deleted all of my product included my domain which was good till 6/24/24 and send me the email saying they deleted all of my product (5) including what I just paid and renewed.   This godday agent is insain or doesn't what he is supposed to do.  In result, my domain is down, website and all of our email account is deleted... everythings are gone.

Review.Titre: Customer service is poor and not trustworthy
Review.Contenu: My domains are expiring and was not in my plans to renew it. I called them on 23 June. The lady told that was okay and my domain cancelled. Even that the took 43.99£. I call them every week and anytime someone over the phone promises a refund never happened. The customer services is trained to lie. The system is worse of scams.  Never again. Never I could recommend that platform.

Review.Titre: A cancellation email was erroneously sent…
Review.Contenu: An email was sent out about discontinuance of my email service on their Workspace platform which was VERY annoying since I am not on that platform.  Why would GoDaddy send that email to everyone?   I wasted 2 hours of my time to verify this did not apply to me.

Review.Titre: WAS: Abysmal customer service. UPDATE: successful countermeasure by GoDaddy
Review.Contenu: * See update suffix below * * Revised from one star to two stars *After 20 years with GoDaddy registrar, I received unusable customer service (via chat) today. My domain had been parked (the DNS A record = "PARKED"). I did not park it. GoDaddy refused to tell me when, why, and by whom it was changed. GoDaddy refused to conduct an audit trail to determine those details. Customer service reps and a supervisor spouted ad hoc security policies that "prevent GoDaddy from sharing those details." Just fess up, GoDaddy!  I'm off to find a more transparent registrar.==============Update, May 30, 2023.I received an email reply from an individual who manages customer reviews for GoDaddy. This representative performed the exact steps I had requested 4 days earlier (an audit trail of DNS settings) & successfully found the issues. Great response from GoDaddy, but no explanation for the previous poor customer service was offered.  Revised from one to two stars.

Review.Titre: I paid a demain with you
Review.Contenu: I paid a demain with youI cant redirect to an other domain No chat ??

Review.Titre: Support always try to sell me something
Review.Contenu: Every time I talk with support, they try to sell me a new package, better email, or something. Never just support.

Review.Titre: Robots.txt and MetaTags issue.
Review.Contenu: Im a php/sqli dev for 25 years / front/back end.The overall look of the finished websites on web builder is definitely professional looking and simple. I just wish that robots.txt was accessible with the web builder package. The plug-ins for the Meta-tags isnt accessible in the basic web builder package. Something worth being aware of - especially if SEO and Google rankings are going to be important factors. Otherwise pretty easy and simple.

Review.Titre: GoDaddy's billing is misleading
Review.Contenu: I had auto-renew on my GoDaddy website. Before the auto-renewal I was informed that I would be auto-renewed for 2 years. There were 2 detailed charges on the auto-renewal email. On the date of the auto-renewal I received an invoice that charged me more than the sum of the 2 detailed charges with a term for the charge of 1 month. I canceled my website rather than pay that sum every month for the next 2 years. I called Customer Support for a refund and they indicated that the charge was really for two years. He was helpful and I renewed for three years, not at the original amount, but a lot less than the monthly bill that I thought I would be paying.

Review.Titre: Go Daddy is excellent for persons who…
Review.Contenu: Go Daddy is excellent for persons who do not have webpage building expertise. Go Daddy makes it easy to build your own webpage, immediately.But..they drop the ball when they do not make CLEAR..that you buy a domain that DOES NOT include the webpage membership. Please make sure you understand this.Go Daddy needs to support members with transparency on subscription webpage costs and cancelling/deleting of the webpage.They will delete your entire webpage if you do not pay for the membership in the 7 day free trial. This is not clear.

Review.Titre: Great people, ends there
Review.Contenu: Joseph at customer service, which I reached after 45 minutes and four trips through your phone tree, was great. Trying to reach a human was beyond painful. The information provided by Go Daddy for newbies is totally inadequate.

Review.Titre: believe that the support for…
Review.Contenu: I believe that the support for WordPress web design is something that needs to be improved. When I called customer service young lady had no idea and had to put me on hold for several minutes to find me an answer. The answer basically was she couldn't help me.

Review.Titre: Need to be more honest with pricing
Review.Contenu: Thought I had a price for my products when I went to score everything up but they failed to add taxes and fees on beforehand which made it look cheaper than it is.  I don't think that's very honest.  And not hard for your tech guys to fix - stop trying to make yourselves look better.  You've just left a bad taste in my mouth now. Do better.

Review.Titre: I have used GoDaddy for over 20 years…
Review.Contenu: I have used GoDaddy for over 20 years to manage my domains. First for a product manufacturer and now for a diocese for all parishes and schools.  I really like their support, better than anybody else and is the reason I stick with them.  The reason for the low score is the frustration I have in managing my credit cards for my account.  I have over 180 domains with about 50 credit cards and it is very difficult to manage.  I have written many times in the past to see if they could improve credit card management.I would be willing to spend time with your development staff to show them where the improvements can be made.

Review.Titre: Worst BlackFriday Sale Experience .
Review.Contenu: Worst BlackFriday Sale Experience .. They Offering me .com for just 99INR but when i go to the card it saying i need to add 2 years extra then it will cost me first year 99INR seriously ? nobody wants to put or buy 3 years domain

Review.Titre: Problem solved
Review.Contenu: Priya the Customer Services person fixed my main issue but did not fix the issue of providing old data that had been lost which she said she would

Review.Titre: Customer support has dropped off
Review.Contenu: Customer support has dropped off, even if you get a person, it is most likely an A.I. person because the answer isn't really an answer. Most common answer is "Pay more upgrade". Which is very common answer for A.I. Lack of details for what you pay for and getting the feeling that godaddy is becoming outdated as a platform, other sites quick easy updating, but godaddy is not.

Review.Titre: Difficult to navigate site
Review.Contenu: Difficult to navigate site. Difficult to link my other exising email accounts and domains. Instructions are neither clear nor user friendly. In the end I got it all to work, but it should not be this hard.

Review.Titre: Delay in Domain Activation - Order No. 2822972913
Review.Contenu: Dear GoDaddy Team,I am writing to express my dissatisfaction with the service I have received. I purchased a domain from your site (Order No. 2822972913) with the expectation of a prompt and efficient activation process. However, it has been over 44 hours, and my domain is still not active. This delay is causing significant inconvenience as it is hindering the progress of my projects.I had a similar experience in the past, and it is disappointing to encounter the same issue again. The expectation of timely service is fundamental, and this repeated delay is unacceptable.I kindly request that this issue be resolved urgently. If not addressed promptly, I feel compelled to share my experience on platforms like Trustpilot to inform others of this recurring problem.Thank you for your attention to this matter.Sincerely,Fatih Alemdar *** The problem is solved, but Domian always activates late.

Review.Titre: They keep sending me messages once…
Review.Contenu: They keep sending me messages once every 2 weeks threatening me of cancellation when they already know I have already renewed whatever it is. And they offer discounts only when they know I don't need it. Usually as soon as I finish renewing all my accounts. Never before.

Review.Titre: Whilst the call handler was extremely…
Review.Contenu: Whilst the call handler was extremely nice, but my question call to GoDaddy remain unsolved. The caller said they will come back to me by COP Friday 10th Nov, but no call or email about my answer. Disappointed with this unfulfil promise

Review.Titre: Paying more than Microsoft charges for…
Review.Contenu: Paying more than Microsoft charges for the same thing.  GD needs to lower their MS365/exchange offering.

Review.Titre: Disappointed
Review.Contenu: I don’t alway need to read and article, I understand with step by step instructions vocally. I also don’t like to be charged for every little thing There are free websites that a business can use today. If everything has a dollar sign to it. It is a turn off and very discouraging especially when you have not built or published your website. And are not utilizing what you are paying for.

Review.Titre: This is my second time using GoDaddy
Review.Contenu: This is my second time using GoDaddy. I returned because of the customer service -- 24/7 works for me because I often work in the wee hours of the morning . .  . I am not good at technology, so when I need help, I need help, not some referral with something to read for me to figure it out for myself!!!!!!! . . . Fortunately, I called back and got someone on the line who was more helpful . . . GoDaddy, your customer service is what makes you stand out . . . Don't lose that competitive edge!!!

Review.Titre: Customer Service person was short & rude with me
Review.Contenu: The multiple times I dealt with customer service, it was great!  Last night I tried to reach out to the 24/7 support line and got a very short, aggravated support person.  I am a lay person when dealing with any IT issues.  Todd was his name sent me a help email and I was hoping he could walk me through it.  He made me feel uncomfortable and in the end, hung up on me or disconnected our conversation to his delight.

Review.Titre: No much technical support on a Outlook…
Review.Contenu: No much technical support on a Outlook email problem, the problem is still pending, my clients don't receive my mails.

Review.Titre: My corporate web mail/domain was hacked…
Review.Contenu: My corporate web mail/domain was hacked last week.  I had to call every day a couple of times in order to solve the issue, since  i have my Microsoft Office 365 license thru go daddy.  The truth this whole situation has been very painful.  I lost a lot of money, not been able to work a week.  Finally, today, Richard, made a spectacular effort and the issue is finally solved.  Overall i spoke with more than 15 go daddy representatives.  Only three of them were receptive.  One lost the patience with me.  I really hope that with the security measures that i had to pay, this won't happened again.  Now i have to contact you guys again, because the final result of the hacking is that my mail storage now is full.  Im guessing i will have to pay for another solution to the problem.  Truth i am a little bit disappointed.

Review.Titre: Godaddy is incredibly un-user friendly
Review.Contenu: Godaddy is incredibly un-user friendly. Waaaay too complicated - and I've had a Godaddy website for nearly 10 years! Whenever there are tech problems (quite often), it takes a call to a customer service centre, who then speak to a tech person, the come back to you, and so on. Rather than just connecting the customer to the tech people direct. Inevitably, it takes an hour or two to get anywhere - sometimes days. But I guess it saves Godaddy money ....(Still, the overworked customer service agents are always polite and as helpful as they can be. Shame they're not paid an awful lot more)

Review.Titre: Godaddy is easy to use-REALLY easy to…
Review.Contenu: Godaddy is easy to use-REALLY easy to use to create a website.it's their upselling and billing practices that I take issue with.  It seems like every time I log in, they are trying to upsell something.  When I call billing for clarification, no one can help me and it's utterly frustrating.  And when I ask about their billing practices, they just quote policy.  I recommend GoDaddy, but read the fine print, really read the fine print and make sure you know what you're signing up for and paying for.

Review.Titre: Unable to change payment method.
Review.Contenu: I had a bad experience trying to update the payment method for my domain name.  First, it was tough to find where I could make the change. After searching for too long, I found the place.  I tried to add a new payment method, but the system would not allow me to save it.  Finally, I had to call for help after wasting too much time.  The customer service representative was helpful. I was not, but I hope that anybody up against the gun in updating their payment information does not lose their Domain name because of the insane way they set this up.  I am set up on auto-renew, but that does not help if you don't have a valid payment method.

Review.Titre: The company is holding a transaction…
Review.Contenu: The company is holding a transaction for an extended period of time.  Requesting information, after I signed up and have already taken payments.  Their web and payment center are treated separately of course, but getting through to chat with someone is complicated.  Money is still in upcoming transfer after 3 working days.

Review.Titre: I have called for service several times…
Review.Contenu: I have called for service several times and I'm unable to accomplish what I set out to do. Asked GoDaddy to merge 3 accounts into 1 and now they are unable to locate a domain that I use for my email.

Review.Titre: insufficient support system
Review.Contenu: You have an inadequate support system.I say this because you force an Italian user to have Whatsapp in order to be able to get support, and the only alternative is to have language support seems a bit limiting as a support solution.I don't consider your support poor, but rather the way you do support is poor.Not everyone has Whatsapp and you should not force a user to use Whatsapp to get support.

Review.Titre: I didn't feel like the $80 fee was fair…
Review.Contenu: I didn't feel like the $80 fee was fair and the reason is that this happened to me two years ago and I wasn't charged the fee and now I was. And the renewal charge went up and that wasn't explained in the email if I waited then the price would change.

Review.Titre: Godaddy’s growth is killing its old personal feeling. Just a number
Review.Contenu: I really do like GoDaddy. I’ve been with them for over 20 years, but I had an experience today building a website through WordPress and I was shuffled around between people who didn’t know what they were doing. I was up on I was really turned off by the growth, and how it makes a client Feel just like Number I didn’t used to be that way.

Review.Titre: The GoDaddy web services system is…
Review.Contenu: The GoDaddy web services system is terrible. The people try and are very polite. But the GD system. I can't ever speak to the same person. they do not understand or follow simple instructions. It took me over 12 WEEKS to get my website up and then updates are very difficult to get done.

Review.Titre: What's my username?
Review.Contenu: When logging in this site asks for username or account number - but nowhere did I create a username nor was a told what my username was. Apparently someone from GoDaddy told me thag AFTER I login I can find it by searching within my own settings, however when I do that it just tells me my FULL NAME or my ORGANIZATION name... but I don't see any spot for username, are either of these other names my username? It would make sense to make this clear for customers.

Review.Titre: Easy to use at first but when help
Review.Contenu: Easy to use at first but when helpIs needed apparently they have a 3rd party, Amazon actually hosts the website and therefore godaddy isn’t able to offer any help. Amazon only operates in email customer service with no directions about my particular issue

Review.Titre: Very disappointed in the removal of the…
Review.Contenu: Very disappointed in the removal of the single page website when you purchase your domain from GoDaddy.  I've been a client for over 20 years and from being forced to Microsoft365 for email to having to update to Trustpilot because of a security breach it leads me to believe that GoDaddy is no longer the leader in web and email hosting.

Review.Titre: Good but could be better
Review.Contenu: Godaddy is the place where I got to for all my domains but i would only recommend godaddy to smaller sized businesses. I only have a online pressence which is why i use godaddy online store which is great but could do with some improvements such as adding afterpay method for customers, adding more templates, fonts etc.Overall Godaddy is a great place to kickstart your first business

Review.Titre: The agent was just rushing through the…
Review.Contenu: The agent was just rushing through the process regardless of my comfort level. I specifically statement that my lack of not knowing what I should was one of the reasons a lot of what I get billed for happens until I managed to call in and have it explained, and those charges reversed which is what happened and usually happens with my account.  Either way…thumbs up though! Cause Godaddy has no problems with issuing a refund or making those adjustment if and where needed.

Review.Titre: Please don't hold my .com hostage…
Review.Contenu: Please don't hold my .com hostage because I don't want to use your website builder. It kept adding multiple random accounts and it was super confusing. I liked the old way better.

Review.Titre: Upgrade Nightmare
Review.Contenu: I upgraded from Basic Website to Premium Website. Problem: My basic web info did not immediately transfer over to my premium account. It created two websites (one already created and one that would have started from scratch). It took 5 hours of talking, waiting on hold, getting disconnected over and over, repeating my story. My basic website was FINALLY moved to my premium website pkg. I was repeatedly told that the scratch website was all they had under my business name. Can't begin to say how incredibly stressful this was and took practically a whole work day to resolve. Shouldn't have been this difficult. Obviously a step is missing when changing plans.

Review.Titre: bookproductionresources.com
Review.Contenu: My website (bookproductionresources.com) was set up by a person (Lisa Smith) who no longer works for me.  She registered the site to her name and not to me (Fred Thompson: I am the owner of Book Production Resources)  I provided documentation that I own the company and was assured it would be transferred to my name.  It has been 4 business days since I last heard from GoDaddy.  Fred Thompson. 813-789-7060.  Cust. No. 71225027

Review.Titre: Go Daddy was having some sort of issue
Review.Contenu: Go Daddy was having some sort of issue, had been all day, spinning, spinning and going no where.  The tech I spoke with told me that at the end of our conversation. However he did help as much as he could

Review.Titre: I sat on Hold for 23-minuets and when a…
Review.Contenu: I sat on Hold for 23-minuets and when a Support person ‘clicked in,’ the call was disconnected.I called in again, waited 18- minutes and then spoke to a Representative.40 minutes on Hold is not acceptable.Godaddy needs to hire more people!

Review.Titre: Email Service going Downhill
Review.Contenu: We had 20+ years of excellent email service with GoDaddy using its WORK SPACE EMAIL.  We transitioned to the Microsoft Platform w/ Security and have had constant difficulties - and no resolutions yet.We are a law firm.  Our clients are receiving "bounce backs" stating that we have blocked their email accounts from sending us email.  NOT GOOD!

Review.Titre: Great Base Product, buyer beware beyond that point
Review.Contenu: The initial website is so easy to change and make updates to that anyone from a child to an elderly person with little skill can make it look AMAZING!!!    The cPanel, however, is a pain in the rear to do anything on. The most basic designs are incredibly limiting. Even when you pay for the 1st tier upgrade, you are severely limited. You don't find out there is another tier you have to pay for until after you've already bought the initial website package. It's probably in the "small print," but no one reads "small print", and Godaddy knows that. It feels like you've been tricked into buying an inferior product at that point. It's incredibly unethical and immoral to run a company like that.    You get 3/5 stars because I love the 1st tier product and can make it work for my purposes. I just have to use a different product to sell my products on and there are many to pick from.

Review.Titre: As much as I like to use GoDaddy for…
Review.Contenu: As much as I like to use GoDaddy for most of their services, I find it a little confusing when choosing a hosting program. It would be nice if they made it more clear whether or not one can purchase a hosting program for a year in advance versus monthly payments and perhaps offer a savings when paying for a year in advance.

Review.Titre: Mail server change was a nightmare
Review.Contenu: Rep David solved my issue in less than 10 minutes after I had spent hours and hours dealing by texting with other reps to solve the problem. Nothing against any of the reps I dealt with but GoDaddy really dropped the ball on the switch from their mail servers to Office 365. It took me 5 days to get my three accounts limping along.

Review.Titre: Tried to update one of my websites &…
Review.Contenu: Tried to update one of my websites & everything was changed on the godaddy site. I was on hold for 20+ minutes & when Jody got on the line it mysteriously started working like before but very slow. She informed me they were doing updates & that might be why. No big deal - I can wait till tomorrow to do my updates on my website. I use other hosting sites for other websites & godaddy has the best support by far, in my opinion.

Review.Titre: Marketing Manager
Review.Contenu: I have always used Godaddy not always have had pleasant expirances. The really need to get control of their customer service becuase its not always pleasant and its understandable becuase of their size. Over all I am happy with the services. However I do not like the software or price changes with out getting notified first.

Review.Titre: Tier 1 support guy was as helpful as he…
Review.Contenu: Tier 1 support guy was as helpful as he could be and very apologetic about tier 2 support not resolving my issue. It may have been more beneficial for me to talk directly to tier 2 instead of having a go between message them back and forth. Meanwhile I’m paying for my customers to be able to download a digital item but they’re not getting the link after they pay for it and tier 2 support is blaming my customers’ email provider. ALL OF THEM. That’s their answer . “Everything is working our end” NOT

Review.Titre: A free website gave me time to build…
Review.Contenu: A free website gave me time to build site as in years earlier.  However, this time the product listing was suddenly removed during the site building stage. After upgrading by paying, I was told to upgrade to another payment level again to add my product selling information to go with the service selling listing that was already available.

Review.Titre: Go Daddy Hosting good, Marketing Service bad!
Review.Contenu: Go Daddy Hosting is fine, but the marketing sucks. Blew off 2 appointments, e-mailed directly to the one I had appointment with during both appointments - nothing, called her directly - says she was busy (How is this when she was suppose to be busy with our appointment?  Kept calling, on hold so many hours total, they should have paid me! Kept saying was going to find out what's happening, no follow-up - Finally asked for a Supervisor, got some help, he put in a ticket but by the time they go ahold of me - I already did it myself.  Save your time, money and frustration - find some other person or company. Go Daddy, always happy with their hosting~ Judith, you did great on getting me my refund, but after jumping through all the hoops, another hour lost~

Review.Titre: Getting set up with GoDaddy
Review.Contenu: Getting set up with GoDaddy is not very easy especially if you are working to transfer a domain and website. Very confusing if you don't have a technical background.  Customer Service agent very friendly and helpful.

Review.Titre: Great customer support terrible web interface
Review.Contenu: Great live customer service support. Terrible web user interface.

Review.Titre: Helpful
Review.Contenu: Helpful, Patience Tessa. Provided information about upgrading to (I do not remember) Professional ?I can send alot of information without using the cloud. I was able to download Word so I can use/work out of my computer. I do not have to log on to my go daddy account to use word. Easy to follow her lead to download app. I am still working on using it, but not today.

Review.Titre: Representatives outside US and Canada do not have product knowledge
Review.Contenu: Most of the support representatives are not well versed with trouble shooting issues and have ZERO knowledge.Very few knows how to help n sort out the technical matters.Those few are either from US or from Canada as per accent I found while speaking on the phone.I maybe wrong but that’s my experience that we have come across through phone  interactions few times during the month Of April 2023. They know exactly what the issue is and route the call accordingly to the right department.Within few minutes they found the issue and solved our problem. Due to others on the phone we lost Canadian $ 3500 Our website was shutdown due to their technical issues and we suffered loss.

Review.Titre: Great Courteous Effort.
Review.Contenu: Support was courteous and tried very hard to find solution to my issue but was unable. To be fair this was partly a third party tech problem. Otherwise always been satisfied with GD's service and products.

Review.Titre: Text vs phone
Review.Contenu: Started out with not being able to call, HAD to text in chat. Finally refused to continue, then HAD to text 5 more times before I was allowed to call. Then that person was very hard to understand!

Review.Titre: I hired a broker
Review.Contenu: I hired a broker, and they told me to offer between $10,000.00-$25,000.00 I thought the differential between the two was too much. I thought it would be nice to get a bid going with a considerably lower offer of $950.00 which they declined to actually offer or even get a conversation started. Just wasn’t my favourite.

Review.Titre: Awesome Assistance
Review.Contenu: Ms. Ruth was extremely patient and helpful. She is very professional and goes beyond the standards of her profession.

Review.Titre: SOOOO frustrating
Review.Contenu: SOOOO frustrating. I spent over 90 minutes, most of it on hold, dealing with three people before my issue was finally resolved. Turns out the problem was very simple to solve but was created by the bad instructions I got in an email from GoDaddy. They migrated me to a new IP address (because at GoDaddy, if it ain't broke, they "fix" it anyway) and in a DIY email, they instructed me to only clear my cache if my content had changed. I hadn't changed one letter of content, so I skipped that step. Apparently, skipping that step is what made my website invisible to the public. The last person I spoke to was efficient, polite and solved my problem, but the overall experience was not positive - at all!

Review.Titre: I did not like that my website was…
Review.Contenu: I did not like that my website was deleted when the trial period expired. I expected a prompt to upgrade or that it would just be taken off-line until I purchased a new package. Since I have to rebuild it now I will shop for a more affordable host that will also save my work.

Review.Titre: This isn't straightforward at all
Review.Contenu: This isn't straightforward at all; it doesn't give any explanations & just moves forward to charge you for more product.

Review.Titre: THE CUSTOMER SERVICE NOT GOOD
Review.Contenu: THE CUSTOMER SERVICE NOT GOOD, ITS GRATE TOOLS I LOVE THE WIPSITE BUYT WHEN I HAVE ISSUE IT TAKES DAY TO BE RESOLVED

Review.Titre: Ability to do some graphics and fonts…
Review.Contenu: Ability to do some graphics and fonts are very limited unless I hire a GoDaddy pro, can't afford that.

Review.Titre: UX failure and praise...
Review.Contenu: GoDaddy's initial point-of-sale business model fails to consider the end-users by insisting on yearly payments, which can be frustrating and budget-prohibitive for customers. This model, favored by many online subscription service providers, results in a subpar user experience. In contrast, GoDaddy's competitor, Network Solutions, excels in customer support, offering a user-friendly solution. As a UX Professional, I'm keen on conducting research and proposing solutions to alleviate this issue. You can reach me at Jesse - 470.275.3184.

Review.Titre: Be careful
Review.Contenu: Be careful.  If the rep doesn't understand what you nmeed, they will sell you something useless.   It's a good thin I called back the next day when I couldn't access the product.

Review.Titre: My account was suspended without notice
Review.Contenu: My account was suspended without noticeThey helped after I called about the suspension but  there should have been an email warning  me about the impending suspension, so that I could fix it.   However once I fixed the problem the website was up and running in 5 minutes

Review.Titre: Unwarranted charges on my credit card…RESOLVED
Review.Contenu: Unwarranted charges on my credit card still unresolved.***Now resolved***GoDaddy took over MediaTemple, but I never got an email so didn't expect to see charges from GoDaddy.

Review.Titre: I like Godaddy but….
Review.Contenu: I like Godaddy, they are very efficient but like Apple I dislike the need to keep a credit card on file that they automatically charge, then I have to call them back up when mistakes are made on their end

Review.Titre: Tech support was extremely helpful
Review.Contenu: Tech support staff was extremely helpful, professional and friendly; however, a wait time of over 35 minutes to speak with someone, plus a "CONTACT US" that wasn't working, means loss of business time for us. Had there not been a resolution, there might have been multiple phone calls that could have easily added up to hours of lost time for a small business owner.

Review.Titre: I have been with GoDaddy almost 20 years…
Review.Contenu: I have been with GoDaddy for almost 20 years.  I buy a lot of domains that I use for marketing properties.  But I don't need websites for each one or an ecommerce website for each one.  I wish GoDaddy would not "opt-in" automatically with these 'free trials'.  It is a pain to have to turn off these "free add-ons" every time I buy a domain...

Review.Titre: Not Consistently First Class
Review.Contenu: GoDaddy's customer service is not consistent. It depends on who you speak with. Some representatives are very kind, patient, and go above and beyond to offer first class customer service, and others are subpar. I think this company offers antiquated website designs. It's time for me to find another support company.

Review.Titre: Offer more suggestions to customers on…
Review.Contenu: Offer more suggestions to customers on how to market their domains for quick sales.  The auction site is pretty much worthless in my opinion.   Try and employ direction communication occasionally verses auto bots...

Review.Titre: Could use a lot of improvement
Review.Contenu: Godaddy's systems for product management are neither simple, nor intuitive, nor easy. They are difficult to maneuver through, and difficult to decipher, particularly if you have a lot of products as I do. The customer service rep today was excellent. He did a great job for me. But I shouldn't have had to call in the first place.

Review.Titre: Asif was finally helpful in securing a…
Review.Contenu: Asif was finally helpful in securing a refund after I had cancelled auto renew  beforehand and was charged regardless.  Sorry Go Daddy, but you make it difficult to delete all business with you by 'complicating' your website. I think I've now succeeded in concluding business and  my refund  is received. This is  Goodbye

Review.Titre: GoDaddy Surely Is Not What It Used To Be
Review.Contenu: GoDaddy used to be the best low cost dealer for websites, added phone lines, help, business issues and products but have become high cost, greedy and not understanding. Oh well I found me a replacement and happy to leave.

Review.Titre: My experience with GoDaddy has been…
Review.Contenu: My experience with GoDaddy has been quite disappointing. Their customer service is incredibly slow, as I had to endure waiting times of over 20 minutes just to connect with a live chat assistant. Moreover, I find their renewal fees to be unreasonably high, which adds to the frustration

Review.Titre: We went around and around
Review.Contenu: We went around and around. I simply asked what email were the support team using to send me updates. So I could find any request and flag they email to VIP. It took four or five times asking the same question.   They finally understood.

Review.Titre: Critical Error
Review.Contenu: Yesterday we discovered our site was down, all we could see was an error message stating that there had been a critical error on this website. Called Go Daddy and long story short, tech told me everything was fine, and that is was probably on my end…reboot router, or some nonsense, then changed subject to “how pleased” was I with the service I had just received…ha not at all??  Found out this morning by calling them back that there had been an auto Word Press 6.2 upgrade that had pushed through and that many sites were down because of it. We are up and going now, thankful to get it worked out. I’m very please with the Go Daddy product, maybe the agents need a little more training.

Review.Titre: Go Daddy took money from my account via…
Review.Contenu: Go Daddy took money from my account via a direct debit for a domain name. When I rang to say I didn't want them to take the money becuase I was closing that website, and could I please have a refund I was told I couldn't have a refund. Apparently, they would try to re-sell it for me! A very poor alternative. I agreed (had no choice) and the person on the phone tried to add it to for re-sale but couldn't!! SO now I have had money taken without an email alerting to me the upcoming withdrawal AND they are unable to offer it for sale! Why do big compananies get away with daylight robbery? However, the good news is that on reading my review they did contact me and offered the refund:-) It is still a shame that it had to come to this and they don't offer refunds normally if you have passed the 30 day mark... I am not sure why they don't!

Review.Titre: Wasted my time with the "free" Web page design
Review.Contenu: After buying a domain I thought I would try out the free web design option only to find out after spending hours on my page... after seven days it gets removed unless you pay more money.This should be clear from the beginning.I now use WIX as they have almost identical layout for free

Review.Titre: Tech support always tries to upsell you on features you don't need
Review.Contenu: When you call for technical support, the support tech always tries to sell you features and add-ons I don't need.  At the end of the call, my issue is sometimes not resolved.  So, I end up calling 12 hours later to get a different tech support representative, and my issue usually gets resolved.

Review.Titre: Be careful when buy a premium domain…
Review.Contenu: Be careful when buy a premium domain with godaddy.  Maybe you don't get the domain, and take 2 weeks for get back your money. Sometimes the real owner only is "testing" the value of a domain, and could not complete the transaction.

Review.Titre: Phone delayed response was brutal
Review.Contenu: The delayed response on the phone was terrible. I called in with a confusing situation and the response thing exacerbated that. I may or may not have resolved the issue...but now have to call again...and go through a long wait and more delayed response. It's grim!

Review.Titre: GoDaddy communication.
Review.Contenu: GoDaddy is a serious company with a good offer. The big disadvantage is that inquiry cannot be resolved by e-mail, rather by phone, which is not free for us users outside the US and Great Britain.

Review.Titre: I dislike not being clear on how my 1st…
Review.Contenu: I dislike not being clear on how my 1st transaction would be on a large amount. It said transaction went through but I had to check email for further verification that wasn't clear but said it was approved.

Review.Titre: Luke was most kind, helpful and thoughtful
Review.Contenu: Luke was most helpful.  I pressed RESET and lost my entire website with over 1200 pages in less than a second.  Luke was able to get my whole website back online within 5 hours.Unfortunately, no one at GoDaddy was able to help me make any changes to my website.  Core FTP is not working.  Changes made using http codes no longer go through.  Cannot update any info on my website any more.GOOD NEWS! GoDaddy Technical Support was able to help me fix my FTP problem from 3:30 TO 4:30 am on May 9, 2023.  Many thanks!!

Review.Titre: Microsoft 365 Email is full of strange…
Review.Contenu: Microsoft 365 Email is full of strange behavior vs old POP/IMAP system.

Review.Titre: GODADDY SERVICE REVIEW
Review.Contenu: The service and prices are good.But Managing the account is a tricky part.Customer service phone never responds.It takes 2 days just to speak with some one.The discount offers are not clearly defined.

Review.Titre: I was trying to get my email forwarded
Review.Contenu: I was trying to get my email forwarded.  There was an internal technical issue and I will have to wait to the let the system work out the problem which may take 24-48 hours.

Review.Titre: Efficient and simple…and boring
Review.Contenu: The experience I think can have a more  tech component to it. Perhaps I need to spend more time in it but it is a very basic web building format.

Review.Titre: Service was okay
Review.Contenu: Service was okay.  Had trouble conveying to the design team what I wanted or looking for.  Every time they came back with an update it was wrong.

Review.Titre: They seem to have finally moved their…
Review.Contenu: They seem to have finally moved their customer support back to the US, which makes a big difference (overseas customer service was very polite but often difficult to understand and seemed to be powerless to do anything beyond the standard).  The site continues to be somewhat confusing and overly-sales focused. On a positive note, it's still the easiest and most secure way IMO to get a domain.

Review.Titre: Unhappy with support.
Review.Contenu: First, the initial person that I spoke with was helpful & then transferred me to the commerce department. I didn't like being on hold for 45 minutes without being able to speak with anyone. I don't understand the  payouts and how long they are supposed to take to get to my bank account. The first place that I went to was the chat and that person didn't know what I was talking about and told me to double check my bank account when I had the bank account open and could clearly see my balance. From there I went to the This is the second time that I have had an issue with money being deposited in my account. I hope this can be cleared up soon! I really enjoy my website and building it up. I just would like for things to move along more smoothly.

Review.Titre: Better set-up instructions needed!
Review.Contenu: Although the website product is good, getting set up is a bit of a stumble around in the dark for a novice as there are no readily available instructions for how to set up or amend pages.

Review.Titre: Received my email notice re renewal on…
Review.Contenu: Received my email notice re renewal on May 6th. On May 16th my cc was hacked which was also the same day my subscription expired. Price in email was $83.88 but b/c I missed the deadline, no fault of my own, I am stuck with a higher subscription price. Doesn't really seem right.

Review.Titre: Good amount of advance warning when…
Review.Contenu: Good amount of advance warning when they moved email but help was a bit short. For what they charge, the ease of use and support could be better.

Review.Titre: A little disappointed
Review.Contenu: I made my own website and it was super easy and I love the ease of getting a website.  I made an error and Kevin stayed on the phone with me for 1 1/2 hours to help Me resolve it.  It turns out it wasn’t resolved.  I initially gave a 5 star review but now I am told my “ticket” will take 72 hours to resolve and I do believe the error is on their end.  I will update again if there is good reason to

Review.Titre: The chat support is not good, phone support is better
Review.Contenu: The chat support is not very good. I wa left hanging several times and eventually gave up. the phone support tis better was able to have my queries resolved each time. The features can be bit clunky so I need to call the phone tech support for an hour at a tie every few days.

Review.Titre: You Can Move through the Automated Menus Quickly
Review.Contenu: The fellow that helped me correct an order mistake I made was fantastic and very pleasant (sorry I didn't get his name). I find this typically true of GoDaddy.I didn't give 5 stars cause honestly, I'm at the point where I'm so sick of automated systems that make it difficult for you to talk to a real person - which I had to in order to fix my issue.  While I did eventually get to a real person (thanks), after dealing with 5 automated systems with various vendors today, I'm just done with not being able to talk with a real person. Lots of companies like to use FAQ pages and I find that, more often than not, the answer to the question I have is not on those pages. So I HAVE to phone and go through automated menu hell. Go Daddy was unfortunately the 6th today and my patience was at an end.  I will say that Go Daddy's automated menus were shorter than most so thanks for that! I was able to reach a real person in about 3 minutes versus most automated systems where I either can't reach a real person at all (don't get me started on a recent airline issue), or I'm on hold/call back waiting for multiple hours.

Review.Titre: Got what I needed thank you
Review.Contenu: Got what I needed thank you. Had to wait 75 minutes to get help but that's probably  pretty normal. I came back to godaddy many times because I had an opportunity to try things before buying which I like. I feel comfortable with it all!

Review.Titre: Dislikes and Likes
Review.Contenu: Dislike: terrible wait times for service! (phone was faster response than chat)Like: Support person fixed all the issues associated with GoDaddy initiated web hosting migration to new server.

Review.Titre: Rep would of call back
Review.Contenu: I liked the representative who helped me, but we got disconnected. Unfortunately, he didn't call me back to finish helping me. I wish he had.

Review.Titre: My experience with godaddy is great
Review.Contenu: My experience with godaddy is great. I like that i get access to different tools to build websites , find affordable domains and manage many websites at the same time. There are certain features i still need help learning as i am trying to scale my web design business .

Review.Titre: Eric was wonderful
Review.Contenu: Eric was wonderful. He asked all the questions he fixed our problem immediately and he took care of things very well and very efficiently. Thank you very much Eric I called last night and spoke to another gentleman whose name I cannot recall who changed my account to.com and make everything very complicated but everything is fixed now. Thanks to Eric.

Review.Titre: Though their domains price are…
Review.Contenu: Though their domains price are horrendous and more expensive than other places. Somehow, their auction system has been the best so far. I've acquired a lot of good domains from their auction marketplace. The only thing that annoying is the transferring process. It took 3-6 days to get your domains in your account. I don't know why it can't be instant like Namecheap (less than 24 hours)

Review.Titre: I was very pleased with Daniel as my…
Review.Contenu: I was very pleased with Daniel as my representative. When I work with someone that is nice and gives the information needed I like to continue working with that individual and Daniel was that person on today. Thank you Daniel!

Review.Titre: The CSR was great
Review.Contenu: The CSR was great! Unfortunately, my problem had to get escalated to another level. Hopefully my issue will get resolved shortly.

Review.Titre: Switched our club's website to GoDaddy
Review.Contenu: Switched our club's website to GoDaddy.  I purchased the website and marketing product and using the template provided have built an effective site. Best feature is the "Contact Us" tab which has brought in 1-15 new/prospective new members over the past year which is the purpose of our new website, attracting new members, vice being an old stale repositor for current members events, newsletters, etc. My only issue is learning how to manipulate the website editing SW, some is straight forward, some features and making changes to current content is difficult. Overall, great move and good support. Perhaps I need a tutorial from an expert but then he/she would do it and I would forget.  The tech told me there is a "manual" so I need to try and find/read that. Again, Good tools for the novice.

Review.Titre: Its good for people who are new to websites editing
Review.Contenu: Its good for people who are new to website editing. Makes appointment booking so much easier, not so much for product sales. Overall, will still recommend to a freshie

Review.Titre: Go Daddy is reliable hosting
Review.Contenu: Go Daddy is more reliable hosting site than others in my expereince.Sometimes information is over my head and I wish it was less techy kind of conversation or directions for the layman user. Getting things done and completed in the background of customer service dont always "stick" so sometimes a second call works.

Review.Titre: GoDaddy webhosting corrupted, lost my data
Review.Contenu: Media Temple folded and migrated my websites and data to GoDaddy. GoDaddy just lost all my hosting and files, unrecoverable. I used my website to host my digital artwork and photos - all gone. Customer service was prompt, although couldn't help or explain why this was happening.UPDATE: GoDaddy investigated the situation and recovered my files!

Review.Titre: Excellent Suport
Review.Contenu: I had an excellent service from Andres Obando helping me with all question that I had.

Review.Titre: Not disappointed
Review.Contenu: Very good, competitive options on GoDaddy. CSR experience was great and I got all my questions answered and achieved my goals at the end of the call. My only issue was its lack of customer support options (e.g Chat Bots, Live Chat, Whatsapp Business). It appears the only way to get immediate assistance is via phone call and as an international customer, its very costly for me.

Review.Titre: Overall I am still a satisfied customer…
Review.Contenu: Overall my interaction with the Awesome GoDaddy Team was a 10*. But due to the change with using my phone to open and send the paylinks, I gave 4 stars. I  was told we have to start using a laptop or desktop to use the paylinks. I enjoyed the phone version because if I am away from the laptop I could invoice the link from my phone so the client can begin payment process. But I am an overall satisfied customer. I downloaded them. Besides you don’t need a website makes it even better being a customer. Happy Safe Holidays from HELP 1 SAVE 1.

Review.Titre: Great host for websites...
Review.Contenu: I have multiple websites and it is great to have them all hosted in one location at a reasonable price. Sometimes the support staff tend to me me as a web-wise person, which I'm not! LOL

Review.Titre: Migration of domain from one Microsoft account to GoDaddy 365.
Review.Contenu: In these days of Artificial Intelligence, it was great to speak with a human being who was patient and sought to assist me with resolving my issue on the first call. I concluded the call with the representative feeling and believing that my satisfaction with their support was key.

Review.Titre: very easy to setup
Review.Contenu: very easy to setup, I built a website over a year ago, unfortunately I let the domain/host license lapse and if more than 30 days I lost the original. the new GoDaddy templates are even easier since I had to rebuild the site. AI helps structure a lot of the descriptions if you want. linking to external SM sites is even easier. price is much more expensive now and the fact that i couldn't refresh my old site is only reason I dropped a star

Review.Titre: Great Service
Review.Contenu: All of the customer service people are fantastic! It's Go Daddy's limitations that are frustrating.

Review.Titre: Excellent customer service
Review.Contenu: I secured a .com name with Go daddy prematurely.  After the purchase I re evaluated my budget and realized I had over stepped.  My representative was very understanding.  When the cash flow ramps up I will be back for their wonderful product.

Review.Titre: Service, Security & People who I can talk too
Review.Contenu: The customer service and availability of people who I can talk too.Also, the security is very important and to date it has been excellent!

Review.Titre: Go Daddy charged me for Smart Line
Review.Contenu: Go Daddy charged me for Smart Line, even though they had switched me over to conversations a month prior, per their request. They are refunding the $173.04, however should never have been charged in the first place. May was very helpful in resolving errant charge

Review.Titre: Finally got a really good support tech.
Review.Contenu: Finally got a really good support tech.On the third try, I got a Windows ASP.Net hosting expert who really knew the system.  I proved to him that it was a hosting server problem, and he fixed it.  It was as good an experience has I've had.  Unfortunately, it took two prior failures to get there.

Review.Titre: A mural place
Review.Contenu: I would give a 5 because the customer service is remarkable. I’m giving a 4 because my website was erased and there was no way to retrieve my info. Although they were very apologetic, that was allot of information lost and there was no refund.

Review.Titre: Technical support…
Review.Contenu: Lisotha from the technical support stayed with me until it resolved. Simultaneously, working with the Godaddy back end team to solve the problem. Now it is fixed as promised.

Review.Titre: Although having trouble its great to talk to somoene!
Review.Contenu: I have been having trouble getting my goDaddy Website up and running. I am having difficulty connecting my domain with the site itself. I am on a deadline and its been a problem for 3 working days already. The service has been helpful and I love talking with support on the phone. It is a pleasure to speak with support!

Review.Titre: Go Daddy phone tech support is excellent …
Review.Contenu: Go Daddy phone tech support is superior.  I've been a customer for over 10 years and always get a technically knowledgeable native English speaking agent who can actually help.

Review.Titre: It was hard to understand the helper…
Review.Contenu: It was hard to understand the helper because of the heavy accent.  I felt like the issue took too long to resolve because of that.

Review.Titre: They have a phone number to call to get…fixed in ONE call!
Review.Contenu: They have a phone number to call to get things done!  I was able to call(got a real person) and get things fixed an a few minutes.  With email assistance like most companies have gone to this would have taken hours to fix.

Review.Titre: Godaddy arrangement of domain name shopping cart clunky
Review.Contenu: Godaddy lists domain names in shopping cart without prices next to each one. This makes it hard to review and evaluate before purchase. I wanted a way  a setting, to list individually but either godaddy does not have it or your person doesn't know. Also  when I buy domain names your cart defaults a 5-year purchase instead of one year. I think that's . . . devious? sneaky? Lots of people only want one year and I'll bet a lot of people just click "Buy" without carefully looking, so godaddy makes 5 times as much money  & customer pays 5 times as much.

Review.Titre: I love the fact that I can talk to real…
Review.Contenu: I love the fact that I can talk to real people at Godaddy, and they are available for all the services Godaddy provides.
